channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: UK in-home healthcare provider Cera raises $150M to scale its AI platform

item.title: The King of Ozempic Is Scared as Hell
item.description: Now that Novo Nordisk is the world’s weight-loss juggernaut, will it have to betray its first patients—type 1 diabetics?

item.title: CoreWeave, a $19B AI compute provider, opens its first international data centers in the UK

item.title: Mastodon announces transition to non-profit structure

item.title: The Money Money Money Issue

item.title: New US Rule Aims to Block China's Access to AI Chips and Models by Restricting the World
item.description: The US government has announced a radical plan to control exports of cutting-edge AI technology to most nations.

item.title: Groww, India’s biggest trading app, prepares for IPO
